title: 9.1.1 Lambda function scanner with rules
body:
## Parent Epic
Part of Epic 9: Advanced Security Scanning (#127)

## Objective
Implement comprehensive security scanning for AWS Lambda functions with configurable rules checking for common misconfigurations and security vulnerabilities.

## Requirements
- Scan Lambda function configurations (runtime, handler, timeout, memory)
- Check IAM execution roles for least privilege violations
- Analyze environment variables for exposed secrets
- Verify VPC configuration and network security
- Check for outdated runtimes and security patches
- Validate logging and monitoring configuration (CloudWatch Logs)
- Detect unused or orphaned Lambda functions
- Check for overly permissive resource policies
- Integration with Intelligence-Builder SDK for AI-powered analysis

## Security Rules to Implement
- Lambda function uses deprecated runtime version
- Lambda function has overly permissive IAM role
- Lambda function exposes secrets in environment variables
- Lambda function not in VPC when accessing private resources
- Lambda function missing CloudWatch Logs configuration
- Lambda function unused for 90+ days
- Lambda function has public access via resource policy
- Lambda function uses default execution role

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Lambda scanner module implemented with all rules
- [ ] Scanner identifies all Lambda functions across scanned accounts
- [ ] Each rule produces clear finding with severity and remediation
- [ ] Integration with Intelligence-Builder SDK for enhanced analysis
- [ ] Unit tests cover all rules (>80% coverage)
- [ ] Integration test validates scanning against test Lambda functions
- [ ] Documentation includes rule descriptions and remediation guidance
- [ ] Scanner performance: <2s per function

## Technical Approach
- Use boto3 Lambda client for function discovery and configuration retrieval
- Implement rule engine pattern for extensibility
- Cache IAM role analysis to avoid redundant API calls
- Leverage Intelligence-Builder SDK for advanced pattern detection

## Estimated Effort
20-24 hours

## Dependencies
- AWS Lambda API access
- IAM read permissions for role analysis
- Intelligence-Builder SDK integration
